overview: Aerial views of meteor impact areas in northern Arizona - horsemen riding along rim of Meteor Crater - group on TWA meteorite trip inspect Meteor Crater - men exit Ford cars parked in front of an airliner, pose for photo - aerial view of Meteor Crater and other impact areas - Ford cars move down dirt road and stop at edge of Meteor Crater - passengers examine crater - aerial footage of impact areas - cars and station wagons driving near Meteor Crater rim - repeat of horseback riders - station wagon and visitors - rock falling into crater.
title: Ford, TWA Meteorite Trip
